text: Hellendoorn is a municipality and town in the province of Overijssel, the Netherlands. About 36,000 people were living there in 2021. Hellendoorn belongs to Salland region (except the very eastern part that belongs to Twente region) but administratively to Twente region. == References == * Plaatsengids.nl Category:Settlements in Overijssel Category:Municipalities of Overijssel Category:Salland Category:Twente
title: Hellendoorn
